content.detailedDescription: I was inside my home just after a severe thunderstorm, and i was watching the clouds as they were hanging in the sky out of my back door. i saw a light in the sky and it caught my attention because the sky was full of heavy clouds, and here the light appeared to be hanging under the clouds. i was seeing it just over the electrical wire that comes from our pole to the house on our west side. that wire was how i was gauging movement of this light, it hung in one place for about 10 minutes, and then began to drop down very slowly. with the movement of the light down, it began to occasionally get brighter, then fade, then get bright again. it got closer to the horizon, i am unable to determine whether it was actually dropping or travelling away from me. one time, it seemed to have a small, dim light separate and fly away rapidly, quickly fading away. within about 90 minutes i watched the light drop from above the wire in the beginning, gauging by the wire, to about the top of our fence, which is 5 foot tall, and fading in the brightness. it finally disappeared by getting lower and fading more and more. we have seen this same type of light moving from west to east several times. since it is opposite the movement of the stars, we know it has to be something other than our natural sky with very few clouds. i have reported this to our police department, and received nothing but a reaction as if i was either drunk, doped up, or just plain stupid. the first reaction would be that we were seeing an ordinary star, but this is much larger than a star. i would say that it appeared more like an airplanes lights when you see them approach for landing, but planes always blink, and this didn't blink. it was mostly solid, with only an occasional blink.
content.summary: Light star like. light off and on going down. like its power going out it has to be down u.F.O. in hobbs n.M.

content.detailedDescription: It was late at night in late summer in 1996, after i got off from work. at that time i got off work at 9pm , i would walk home which usually took about 25 - 30 minutes. however on this night it was as if i had awoken in my home , and the entire area around me was completely bath in in white light. i went outside to see where the light was coming from that was when i saw it was coming from above my trailer , it seemed to hover for a few minutes then it slowly went upwards into the night sky. it was a few days later that i noticed there where three or four oval shaped marks on my chest , a lot of people thought i had had heart surgery but i assure you i have never had an kind of heart condition or surgery to this date. also there is only two of these marks left on my chest. i still remember this to this date as if it were yesterday.
content.summary: It was late at night it was as tough i woke up

content.detailedDescription: When my mom was 7-8 years old,she was living in the mountain park/high rolls area of new mexico, she had a dream that these little grey beings took her and were doing things to her. she woke up screaming and my grandmother came running into the room. my mom told her that the little men took her. my grandma told her it was just a dream and to go back to sleep. my mom had dreams about the little men for years until they moved to arizona when she was about 10.  the crazy part is that she was haunted by their eyes because the were silverish and their body's were smaller than their heads. my mom was born in 1930. it wasn't until the book contact came out with the grey on the cover that her childhood dreams came rushing back to her. the area that she lived not very far from roswell nm.
content.summary: Abduction by greys

content.detailedDescription: The first one i saw was in 2007 it had a crescent shaped white light it appeared in the sky it hovered for a few seconds changed direction started moving then the light glowed brighter as it warped out of sight. another ufo that i saw the next year was just hovering over an industrial area it was between 3 and 4am i was on my way home from work and this ufo was some what triangular shaped kind of like an f-117 but with three orbs of light glowing from the bottom, it was very visible only about 3 or 4 hundred feet height and as i was passing it, it was turning with me as if it was also watching me. i kept driving until i couldnt see it, after i couldnt see it i turned around to go see it again but it was gone. another time that i have seen ufos was in 2013, i had just come home it was around 3am and i looked up, it was a somewhat cloudy night but what i saw was amazing, i saw multiple ufos, i stopped counting after i got to 13. there was atleast 20. i thought i was crazy or seeing stars but i stopped and stared for over 5 minutes as i watched them go past the moon! there are a few more times where i have seen ufos but these 3 cases were the most absolute, they were definitely our of this world, i was even a skeptic before i saw my first ufo, i have not told many people because i know many would not believe it but i know what i saw, i have had 5 different occurrences where i have seen ufos, its just to bad ill never find out what they wanted.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I have witnessed multiple ufo's

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv when my nephews come running telling me there's something in the sky i went outside with 3 other adults  and from our vantage point in henderson n.V witch sits above las vegas we watch a brilant blue orb go from one side of the valley to the other it seem to cross the valley in about 2sec. then it moved up and down  zig zaging between macarren airport and nelli's air force base ,my life long friend who is a non believer watched it with us after i asked him what he thought now  he still don't believe but says he can't explain what we seen on that clear vegas night
content.summary: Me& 5 others watch a blue  large blue orb darting above las vegas from elevated veiw of th city  it was life  changing

content.detailedDescription:
Mid summer of 2013, my husband noticed very faint verticle beams of light on a nightly basis. every night, we would go outside and observe them. 

one night between 9 and 11 pm, we took a blanket outside and watched the beams together, as they were particularly more active this night. sitting on a blanket, watching these beams of light, we found ourselves confused as to their starting point. were they coming from earth and beaming to the sky, or were they coming from the sky to earth? we couldn't distinguish. 

as we were sitting there, we called our son (10 years old) outside to see if he could see them. we told him nothing of our observations. we simply asked that he look around and tell us what he saw. initially, he saw nothing. we asked him to continue. finally, after about 3 minutes or so, emphatically, he exclaimed that he could see several beams of light. he, too, however, could not distinguish their starting point. 

as we were all sitting there on the blanket discussing possibilities, the three of us looked up toward the tree line because we noticed that, there too, were beams of light. as we looked up, we all saw a bright, gold disc. 

in that moment, not one of us can readily recall or identify our feelings and thoughts about what we were witnessing. it was as if we were, literally, in a state of complete shock or, perhaps, inexplicably victims of deliberate and well-designed mental captivity. only afterwards, have we been able to consider the occurrence. with that said, in that moment, we all, without doubt or question, knew that we were witnessing a genuine ufo visit. we knew that the craft was not of human construction.  

in our recollection, we remember that the gold seemed to be a very bright light. very bright. the light, for some reason, though, didn't light up its surroundings. the light was confined. it didn't spread like a normal light.   

the object seemed to have two main sections. a center and a revolving outer disc. i could observe that the sections were separated by a relative small space. each section seemed to have an extremely fast rotating movement. each section, however, moved in the opposite direction of the other, yet equally fast. 

the disc was hard to scale. our perspective was distorted due to the black, starless sky this night. however, within the view of our vantage point were trees. 

the disc was slightly above the tree line, but our perspective, or lack thereof, made it difficult to gauge if the size was as we saw it to be (size of a normal, above-ground swimming pool), or if its size was considerably larger, yet further away. with lack of backdrop or other known and measurable objects around it, it has been impossible to properly approximate the size. 

within the course of a minute, the disc propelled itself to the southeast leaving no trace of it ever having been there.

a few things that my family and i noticed and discussed following the sighting:

the object seemed to provide its own source of energy from the two moving discs. 

the gold color didn't seem to be the color of the object, but rather the color of the energy it produced.

when the object propelled itself, there was no sound. there was no light path. there was no observable propeller. the movement could almost seem like that of a swiftly changing mind-quick and mindful.

the object was hovering in one place. in an instant, the object seemed to slingshot across the sky. 

though we could see it move away, we could only see a small fraction of a second of its movement before it was no longer observable. 

once the moment was over, my family and i, in amazement, sat in utter silence while still in the same place outside. while trying to conceptualize what we witnessed, we each observed the faint beams of light become more frequent and closer in distance to another. 

finally, while grasping for clarity in our state of utter bewilderment, our confusion turned to suspicion of our government; for within the following five minutes of the object's appearance, a small plane began to fly in a triangular pattern, repeatedly, around the area of the sighting. from where the small plane initiated its flight and the location it ultimately retired, was charleston's air force base. for the next hour, several planes, of comparable size, flew in various, yet repetitive, flight patterns.

to this day, we still look back at this perplexing experience in hopes to understand what happened. still, we are left bewildered.
content.summary: Disc had a center, and it had an outer disc rotating the center. gold. very bright and radiant. no heat. hovered. then, quickly flew away. also, before and after, hundreds of faint beams from sky kept beaming to earth. very, very faint beams.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
Pearl size of a beach ball  falling straight down about 7 yards away from me,to eye level hovers for about 8 secs, than moving at a un worldly  speed from yard to yard like it was taking a picture of each one. that's what the flash looked like then gone. the one huge thing about this story which i think is golden and tripy is space x is rite down the street as well as the airport. also anouther this happened at my xs house,my xs was the second witness,but any way her bro had seen the same thing a week before,but the glowing ball was going up to the airplanes that wr lifting off and what looked like it was taking a flash photo once again. not even gonna lie i use to be really skeptical to ufos until this encounter.  i'm a ancient aliens fan and i just seen the show u guys came out with so i til my self i had to tell someone. 
thanks for being someone to yurn too
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pearl size of a beach ball  falling straight down about 7 yards away grom me,to eye level hovers for about 8secs, than moving at a un worldly  speed from yard to yard like it was taking a picture of each one.Thats what the flash looked like then gon

content.detailedDescription:
I was civilian working for usaf at wpafb.  my co worker was in charge of project blue book.  he showed me all of the files.   there are no, zero evidence of anything even remotely connected to aliens in the files. everything was some contrived usually extreemly crude attempts at making some kind of ufo.  beer cans, flashlight batteries you name it.

i also worked next to infamous hanger 53.  walked thru it daily.  nothing ever was hidden there or anywhere else on base.

even if they were to discover aliens there would be no reason or way to hide it. it would have become public.
content.summary: Viewed actual project bluebook files

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: I have had multiple ufo sightings most in new jersey in the late 1970's. however i also had a sighting while camping in the sierra mountains west of bishop ca. in 2009. these sightings in new jersey range in duration from a mater of seconds up to 20-30 minutes where i witnessed a hat like craft that was hovering less then 500 feet off the ground. it appeared to have windows and the windows changed colors from blue to green. it appeared to be in trouble as it had what appeared to be sparks coming out from under it. the sparks were of various colors. i observed this for 20-30 minutes. i have also witnessed them suddenly appearing in the sky as dots that looked like stars all in a straight line with more dots forming in the line. suddenly they accelerated so fast from one side of the horizon to the other, faster then our eyes could tack and were gone. i have also seen them appear as what looks like a star then suddenly accelerate at extremely high rate of speed. they then abruptly change direction at extreme angles. this area in new jersey is nothing but farmers fields surrounded by forest. the sighting up in the mountains was quite different where my wife and i observed a v shaped flash of lights that last for only a couple seconds. after about 10 seconds it flashed again. after about ten minutes it happened again. it appeared to be over the desert south east of bishop.
content.summary: Contact me

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was with my friend walking down to beach .. i heard the whistling humming noise i look over to sky and see something hovering with flashing lights 
it looked unusual to be plane 
saw grey looking cyndelier object hovering humming lights flashing , it continues to hover as we walk down to beach area we look up and it shoots into the sky 
i couldn't believe it 
we also noticed a family trying to video sighting but their camera phone was not working 
i was scared and retuned back to the house we were at 
i went to cabo for a wedding
content.summary: Heard a whistling noise something hovering then vanished in clouds
content.locationName: Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur

content.detailedDescription: We were coming back from church and we all saw a strange lights in sky. it was a discount with different colored lights going around object.  when we got home we watch the craft hover right over the house . it was close you could touch it from the roof. i tried to get my parents to come out but they wouldn't come out. me and my friend came in the house three hours later. i had the weirdest rash on my shoulder that looked like crystal growing out of my shoulder and at night it would oze off at night. that lasted about a month. i also had foil coming into my mouth the next day like if i had eating candy with a foil rapper. plus i had strange marks on my body. i did not realize everything that happened until i went to a hip nosive.
content.summary: The craft hovered over house and me and friend both lost about 3 hours of time.

content.detailedDescription: The object has appeared on more than one occasion in the same location.
content.summary: Stationary hovering glowing silver disc

content.detailedDescription:
Entering apartment building in revere, mass on thanksgiving night in 1989 when in elevator building shook elevator lights went out, but we reached 5th floor. we pulled open elevator door and hall lights were out..Went into apartment and went to slider window. we drew open the curtains and behind our building is a good size baseball field. the entire field was covered with a huge spaceship with dim lights .  all of a sudden we heard a huge noise enough to shake a building  and moments later the sound of sirens. within seconds the spaceships lights became brighter and the lights were blue and white now and moving faster in a circle and the craft  lifted 20 feet off the ground and was suspended in mid air with lights moving around very fast and within seconds went up another 30 feet stayed for about 5 seconds and shot up into the sky in a left angle. we immediately went outside the building down the stairs due to the noise of the sirens and we learned that the generator across the street had exploded and that was why the fire department was there..Although we had our suspicions that it was the spacecraft that may have caused the explosion or maybe drew energy from the generator. there were three of us who witnessed this, only two of us talk about it.. the other person denies she ever saw it.  
from that moment i realized that religious fundamentalists were not ready for what science has to offer..Changed my whole perspective about religion, and opened my brain to the belief that if we exist as humans on earth then beyond the galaxies there must exist other intelligent life form who may have had a hand in human existence.  the speed at which that spaceship flew was beyond my understanding. there is undoubtedly a master architect of this universe.
content.summary: Please see below

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside talking on the phone with a friend. i  was talking about how nice of a night it was...So clear and calm and checking out the stars. at the time i was looking south/southeast and started to turn looking east than towards the north when i seen 5 white objects in the sky. at first i thought they were birds or bats. i then started to think,its so dark out and they were kinda high up to see them so clearly and just how white they were. there was no sounds. the objects were flying in a v formation and two of the objects started moving out of the formation, kinda falling behind and irratically moving in the sky for about 30 seconds before rejoining the formation. i lost sight of the objects as the kept traveling east. it had to have been at least a mile away towards the east when i was no longer able to see the objects. i was on the phone the whole time describing what i was seeing to my friend. i was and still am confused by what i had seen. sense i was on my phone i was unable to get any pictures or video of the objects. this happened on tuesday may 12, 2015 around 1130 pm. i live close to an air force base and see different kinds of aircraft throughout my lifetime, but what i have never seen anything like this before. i've been keeping an eye out the past few nights and have not seen the objects again.
content.summary: Saw bright white objects moving from northwest to east

content.detailedDescription:
Me and two of my friends were out testing my new truck in the hills in [location removed], after crawling around for about 50 minutes it got dark so we started to head back. venus was already visible in the sky  for about an hour, but my friend kept trying to get me to stop and look at something but i just wanted to get home after a few turns i seen venus and it was twice as bright at least as it should be, and it was kind of blinking like a star. so i gave in and i drove about 1 more minute and pulled up so we could get out and get a good look. 

just as i said it was venus, but that could not explain why it would get bright and then blink. they said it, at times would turn into cigar or blimp shape, in the middle of both i don't think it did. but what i seen was when it would get brighter, a brighter white, a lil red light would come out the side for a second and white light would dim.  well lol it looked like it came out of it and started circling really fast. they said it changed shapes but what it look like was when it was circling the light just well i think you could just see the light going around and it made it look like a saucer or cigar. but i also cannot explain why when the little red light stopped venus would get brighter. and i also cannot explain how it would completely disappear. it would get bright white, change orangeish to reddish and then get smaller and then just disappear! that happened about 3 times. it was cloudy and the moon was behind us, but... none of the other stars or the planet next to it did anything strange, and we could see the clouds with the moon. and lol i almost think for a moment after the little red light stopped circling, well it looked exactly like a classic flying disc with the little bell right on top in the middle. lol i wouldn't even believe my own friends if they say they see something, and i'm probably not credible at all, and if i was i was ever asked i would say just as i did then. it was venus, acting very strange. i just wanted to report this strange event just in case it wasn't venus and someone else seen it.  thanks for your time.
content.summary: I believe it was just venus, but it was acting very weird.

content.detailedDescription: As i got out of the car to walk into toys r us, i looked up at the sky and decided to capture its beauty. i told my mom to look up as well and nothing seemed out of the usual. later that night as i was looking through my photos, i saw these odd that i hadn't noticed before. it doesn't look like an airplane to me but who knows. also, my camera works perfectly fine. no scratches on the lens.
content.summary: I didn't see anything strange as i was looking at the sky but these strange lights appeared in the photo.

content.detailedDescription:
On a clear star filled night around 12:00am me and my brother where up in our room playing video games with our window open. my mother opened the front door and starts walking down the driveway to take the garbage out when she started yelling for me and my brother. i ran to the window and my mom was in distress so i looked to see if there was a coyote around her since a few nights before she was confronted by a coyote in her back yard and i didn't see anything. i grabbed a baseball bat to drive the possible coyote away but when me and my brother exited the front door we where in disbelief what we where seeing. there was a beach ball sized reddish orange yellowish ball of light hovering directly over my moms head just over the trees and it moved almost like if it had a mind of its own once it noticed me and my brother.

 so me and my brother started yelling at this thing and i was swinging the bat yelling to get out of here when it seamed to become wary and rise a few feet higher but still directly over my mom. the ball of light then slowly moved directly over my moms house without even making a peep and we ran down to where my mom was to see if she was ok. we then acted bold as if we where out to get this thing and moved towards it yelling and throwing our arms around when all of a sudden it disappeared with a blink of an eye almost as if it cloaked itself or just took off at an amazing rate of speed. we couldn't believe it and my first reaction when walking back into the house was to grab the house phone and call my girlfriend at the time not knowing by picking up the phone i was going to be blasted by static that i've never heard before..  no ring tone !!! i can only describe it as the static you get from the tv when a station is out and those black and white patterns are fluttering on the television but it was even stranger then that. the static from the phone bothered my ear and i felt strange for awhile but never said anything.. strangely the next night i was looking at the stars wondering what and why i experienced this when i noticed that one of the stars i was looking at seamed to wobble to the left just enough for me to notice so i grabbing my binoculars.. i watched this star for awhile and it did not move anymore that night but it made me realize that it's possible for these objects to be deceiving us acting and looking like stars so that we wouldn't realize that they are there. to this day i'm curious with the stars and i really would love to confront this object if i ever had the chance calmly and curiously.
content.summary: Mom went to take garbage out then yelled mine and my brothers name that she was being attacked .

content.detailedDescription:
Fountain green -- “the object was seen in the mountain range just directly south of mount nebo near nephi, utah and two miles southwest of fountain green on september, 16, 2005.” i was with two other co-workers setting up a gps base station-when i noticed an object projecting a soft glowing light. i pointed it out to my co-workers and they both agreed it was not a helicopter since it made no sound and was too big to be one. we were at 8500 feet and the object was southeast of us about two miles away at 7000 feet altitude. 


  it appeared as a dot of light with a metallic sheen around the light.  the object traveled up the ridge of the mountain range across from us at a lower elevation and began hovering in the same spot for 15 to 20 minutes.  i rushed back to the helipad where the helicopter dropped us off and grabbed my digital camera and zoomed in on it to get a better look at it. there was a soft glow of light or energy emitting from the centre of the object in a gyrosycronis pattern. it was a top shaped craft of some sort that flew near us from 8:30 to 9:00 am, so the sun was to the east on the other side of the craft low in the horizon. i would say the object was about 30 to 40 meters wide and can not be explained by any conventional man-made or natural objects ? there were also 2 other objects of identical description triangulated across the valley several miles apart. our helicopter that dropped us off picked us up and the pilot asked "what the hell is that thing on the ridge down there, i told him i didn't know and told him to go and check it out, when we got in he powered up and turned from his west landing position to east to move towards the object, it was gone. the third surveyor that we had to leave on the ground had his eye on the craft and told us over the radio that as we turned to engage it the craft shot off with lightening speed to the northeast at a sharp trajectory. 

this was originally reported to  muffon a week later from this date
content.summary: Myself , 2 other surveyors and a helicopter pilot witnessed a very large large top like object glowing accross the ridge from us at a lower elevation and i snapped a picture of it with my digital camera

content.detailedDescription: We were all in our apartment jacuzzi maybe a little after 9pm, my cousin was in the pool with my son and as i'm watching them swim around i see some lights just appear in the sky, maybe between 40 and 60 lights. i see them moving and more randomly just appearing and fading away. i tell my girlfriend to look over and she jumps up yelling what's that. we get my cousin to look and another couple in the jacuzzi to look. we were all speechless and confused on what we just witnessed. the lights moved up and down,the pattern of the flight was something we have never seen before. the lights begun to get brighter. almost looked like white led lights, we saw and watched the lights move from southwest then to the south. as we were watching they all seemed to disappear all at the same time. our first thought was chinese lanterns, but these weren't amber colored and there was no wind to make the lights move the way they were moving. it was a night we'll never forget.
content.summary: Insane, frightening

content.detailedDescription: In the spring of 1974 a silver disc caught my eye through the windshield just as it moved ahead of me over the road in piedmont, missouri. didn't know if it had been following me.  i stopped car, got out and looked up at which time it stopped moving.  it was silver with rings on the bottom similar to the rings on a vinyl record or to explain better, rings in an aluminum pan.  there were no lights except that the street lights seemed to be reflecting on it.  there was no sound. no windows. it was at least as wide as the two-lane road. i looked around and there was no one around, not one car or person that i could see. there was a tavern on the right and it was closed. i was literally stopped in the road and standing just outside my car door. i slowly started moving away from me after crossing the road and it slowly disappeared from my view. i could then see that the top was the same as the bottom. i was at the school in 1973 when the basketball team told of what they saw. as for my sighting i wasn't a stranger to ufos or embarrassed by the stories.  i just don't remember much and never have regarding my personal incident.   i am now almost 59 years old.  hardly a day goes by that i don't wonder where i was going, where i had been that night, and did i tell anyone about it.  i just have no memory of before or after the event.  i have wondered if i could be hypnotized to see if anything else occurred that i have blocked out.
content.summary: Noticed something through windshield above me.  got out of car and stood in road and looked up at it. length of time unknown.  it slowly crossed the road and went to my left.

content.detailedDescription:
My mom and i were in the front yard walking our dog out and just casually talking; we were looking towards the sunset, and i saw something at first which i thought was a plane, but it looked a little different in shape. i asked my mom to look, and we both realized it was not a plane since it was more circular. we then thought maybe it was just a balloon but started coming lower in altitude and closer before then hovering above the trees maybe 10 stories before moving over us towards the north. as it passed we could see a solid black sphere with 3 lights coming on and off and rotating in the middle. as it passed we ran to see around the trees and were like what was that!? then as we started walking back we saw a second pass right over us, exactly the same in appearance following the other and then another. there was absolutely no sound. 

at this point i asked my mom if she thought we would have time for me to run and get my cellphone to take a picture. then a fourth went right over and so i ran and as i came back out a fifth had just passed over. in the best picture i got which i uploaded as picture 1, you can see an object in the middle, but they were much bigger and closer when we saw them straight overhead. they were moving not fast but clearly much faster than any wind.  the other pictures after the first i am not sure if anything can be seen or if some of the other ones can be seen farther in the horizon once the pictures are enlarged.  both my mom and i are in a state of shock and awe. we have never seen anything like this so clear. thank you for your time in checking this out and for the work you do.
content.summary: About 5 circular objects above trees and house with 3 rotating lights in middle which both my mom and i witnessed for about 2-3 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished eating at late night cafe after a friday night football game i coached.  this was an every away game thing me and my head coach did after everyone leaves field house.  i left going to my parents house out at the lake, takes 20 min. to get there. about a mile down the road, i noticed what looked like a new star or planet on the horizon, looked mainly white at first with a slight shimmer of colors.  i am a science teacher and was very intrigued with this object. as i left the outer part of town going east towards the lake, i kept looking at this strange "star-like" object. as i passed the turn in of our local country club, i started noticing that the object was not only bigger but also could start to make out distinctive fluorescent orange and green light emitting from the object.  at this point i was ten or so miles from it and started to believe maybe a was seeing another unexplained object.  this is the first time i have reported anything like this. as i got closer, within 5 miles, the object no longer looked white at all, only the orange and green lights were visible on top of a faint baby blue light.  the object did not looked like it had even moved, just kept getting bigger the closer i got.  when i was at my closest point to the object, best estimate a mile, the object had a distinctive shape of a perfect pyramid with three edges showing, middle edge was fluorescent orange with the other edges fluorescent green.  the base of pyramid looked to be sitting on a perfectly round baby blue disk with a yellow ribbon-like wave circling around its edge.  the two sides of the pyramid were a dull black barely reflecting any of the lights on the edges.  the best i can describe the pyramids lights would be like that of the light sabers on star wars.  the pyramid appeared to be huge, yet at arms length was about at big as a penny to quarter size and still had not moved hovering high in the sky, maybe a mile up.  it was at this moment that i lost sight of object and turned on road leading to lake house.  after about a half mile, i once again saw pyramid, but now looked about 3 miles away.  this was the last chance for me to see because of all the trees close to the road. it seemed to be now back towards town slightly. i now sped up and got to the lake house hoping to see it again, keeping track of where in the sky it should be. but once there, had clear view of the ne to se sky and saw nothing. i tried twice, going down highway, to take picture but got nothing except flash on windshield and one with my finger over phone camera with window rolled down.  i know my other two sightings were strange in years past, but at least could have been possibly explained.  this was different, i have no reasonable explanation whatsoever of this.  it was truly a mind-blowing experience for me.
content.summary: New the object had a distinctive shape of a perfect pyramid with three edges showing

content.detailedDescription: 1969, in maricopa, california i was only 10 years old i was standing in the front yard of our home, i noticed movement in the sky and looked up to see a huge white cylindrical object that appeared to be descending.  at first it was angled with the rear of the object pointing down and there was a hint of fire and smoke.  the object then came to a stop, leveled off with the front of the craft pointing east rear west.  it hovered briefly, the small amount of smoke completely disappeared.  it then began to travel at a steady speed westward until it disappeared in the horizon.  the next day the local newspaper (taft driller)said several people had witnessed russian space trash enter the atmosphere.  even at only ten years old i knew what i saw was not an uncontrolled object.  this sighting had a profound effect on me and for the rest if my life. as i grew older and we moved to oklahoma as a teenager i and a number of friends in a rural area where i lived witnessed an orb ascend slowly from some trees slowly then descend back into the trees making no noise and frightened us so much that all of my friends left me alone in my driveway in the middle of the night. no one talked about it.
content.summary: Sunny day, no clouds, object slowly descended at angle from the west heading east with no sound slight smoke was noticed in rear of craft then dissipated as it leveled, hovering briefly before flying east

content.detailedDescription: About fourteen years old,going through puberty.Lying in bed i awoke by a blinding white light. through bedroom window being emuniated from a large circular glowing white object i looked out my bedroom window and saw a large glowing white object.I went black then opened my eyes in a bright room. i couldn't see where the light was coming from.Beside me was an entity-organism lying on something like a surgical table. there was no hair on this species,it had a large head, large almond shaped eyes,tan skin with darker tan skin in various areas, no visible ears, completely naked, female sex organ, no breasts but had nipples, no lips small smiling mouth with no lips, made a soothing cooing sound, i felt a great love for this particular unique entity-organism of this species.I am quite sure we became intimate with mutuality.Next thing i remember it was morning.
content.summary: In bed woke up to a blinding beam of light through bedroom window being emminated from a large circular glowing white object

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were returning home from the store. we were traveling east when we heard a humming noise. i looked behind us and saw a saucer type craft. it was at a 45 degree angle to our car. we were scared. the craft followed us for approximately 1 1/2 miles until we pulled up in my parents driveway. then ascended and disappeared.The craft ascended straight into the sky and vanished. we never saw it again.
content.summary: Followed us for about 1 1/2 miles then ascended and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
About seven illuminating clouds in a perfect circle that could read our minds.  spun around a fixed axis becoming smaller until it disappeared.  never have been the same! i have told a few people about my witness of, i have no doubt an un-worldly happening.  i was on vacation with my parents, a friend of mine from college and my cousin in [removed location].  we were all talking about something in much depth when i noticed my cousin staring over the ocean.  she seemed absolutely fixed on something in the sky.  when i asked her what she was doing all she could do was point speechless over the ocean. when i looked at what she was pointing to all i saw was maybe seven perfectly round illuminated small clouds in a circle.  i told my cousin who was still in a trans like state that it was probably the moon behind some clouds illuminating them.  
she then speechlessly pointed towards the moon which was much to my concern, on the other end of the horizon.  i was now absolutely captivated by this and soon was my other friend.  there we sat gazing at this thing in absolute paralyzing attention.  what ever it was, it seemed to be watching us even though it was hundreds of yards away.  it knew all of our fears and as soon as it knew we were watching it, it started to spin around a fixed axis becoming smaller until it disappeared into thin air.  we stood there looking to see if it might return, hoping that it did not, and it didn't.  i so much wanted to talk about what we had just witnessed but everyone acted differently about it.  my cousin stayed in a trans for the rest of the night and my friend was so frightened that he did not want to talk about it fearing that it might return.  i would like to know if i am alone in this witness!  i don't have any one to talk to and would appreciate feed back if at all possible.  thank you.
content.summary: About seven illuminating clouds in a perfect circle that could read our minds.  spun around a fixed axis becoming smaller until it dissapeared.  never have been the same!

content.detailedDescription:
We live full time in an rv and we were working as volunteers at [location removed].  we were just outside doing some work around the yard and the rv and just enjoying the view and the day.  the mountains always draw my attention and there is what i have been told is a border patrol blimp that they have up for observation many times.  

i first noticed the object because it just sort of appeared.  there was no sound like with a regular aircraft.  it just sort of hovered in the area by the mountain.  it seemed to glint in the sunlight.  i am not sure if it was white or silver.  the shape was really strange like no aircraft i had ever seen.  it reminded me of a wishbone, or boomerang.  well, actually it reminded me of those balancing birds you could buy that had their wings stretched to the front.  

as far as the motion, it just sort of appeared in the sky, hovered for a bit and then flew in a straight line to the west, and then just disappeared again.  there was absolutely no sound that i could hear, no engine whine or roar or anything.  the thing i thought was weird too is that unlike many of the flying wing type aircraft of today, it actually flew with the wings forward, not with the nose part forward.

as far as my feelings and reactions - i definitely believe in ufos and i did not fear it but was enthralled with the sight of it.  i was excited.  i ran into the rv to get the camera and got a couple of shots before it went away. i believe that i went right in and downloaded the pictures off my camera, but i am not sure if i did it later or the next day.  i cannot remember now.  my husband was outside with me and he witnessed it as well.  he is more skeptical when it comes to strange things like ghosts and ufos but even he thought it was a little strange.  i don't really know how long it all took place but it stayed in place long enough for me to run in and get my camera and snap off a few pictures.  it was like a surreal moment, like time stood still.  the duration time i put is simply an estimate as i was not watching my watch.

i used a regular digital camera and zoomed it as far as it would go and i only had one good picture and i had to crop it to get it to be seen as it is.  i am not a professional photographer nor has it been altered through photo shop or anything.  the second picture i am submitting gives a view of our site and the mountains and the electric wire which can be seen in the ufo shot to give a perception of where the object was.
content.summary: We were standing outside and just saw it in the sky and realized it did not look or act like any plane.

content.detailedDescription:
While traveling north on route 684 from hutchinson river parkway  i observed a heavy dark cloud going north on 684 but on the south side.  the cloud at first appeared to be a part of  the overcast that existed at the time.  as i proceeded north at 65 mph for about 10-15 minutes a ovular object began to come out of the left front side of the cloud.
    the ovular vehicle had no wings,propellers or jets. it didn't make any noise. the object was greenish  around the outside .  the front had been quartered like a cross. in the front. in the upper left quarter was a white  lighted area in the middle was a figure with a balloon like head.
       the vehicle descended from the cloud about 20 -30 feet stabilized and followed me up rt. 684 .
          as  i approached katonah exit 7 the vehicle ascended up  backwards without turning around.  the larger cloud cover was by then thinner. the vehicle that was in the cloud took a better shape.  it seemed to be like an hour glass.  each end was sextagonal. it seemed to rectangular with a angular point at the left and right side. the same for the back.
            the thinned out cloud picked up speed an went northwest.
             this vehicle was on ufo files on the four species visiting planet earth. this program aired approximately march 16th, 2008.  i reported it shorty after since i knew at that point it was a ufo.
driving at 65 miles per hour from hutchinson river parkway north onto route 684 a. ufo was covered in a cloud at white  plains .    the cloud went parallel on the south side of rt. 684  at tree top level. i thought of it only as cloud
               i reported this in 2008  .      can you acknowledge that you still have this report.
content.summary: Driving at 65 miles per hour from hutchinso river parkway north onto route 684 a. ufo was covered in a cloud at white  plainsfe .    the cloud went paralell on the south sideof rt. 684  at tree top level. i thought of it only as cloud that would

content.detailedDescription: Standing in back of my friends house me and my mother and look up there came over an h shape object with metallic bar on top and bottom it was flourance orange in color with three spotlights on each side bout 4 foot wide and 8 foot tall on rocking back and forward as it move above the house bout 8 mpr very slow we was scared banging on are friends back door and it went out aways started going up aback across town
content.summary: H shape metallic bar top and bottom spot lights on sides three on each side

content.detailedDescription: I was laying on back of family pickup alone looking at night sky and stars and noticed one of the stars was moving on a straight path going northwest and i thought it was the space shuttle chugging along but suddenly the star like object made sudden turn towards the south and i know nothing can just turn without stopping and certainly the space shuttle could not do that.  i was ecstatic but told no one not even my family for fear of being called crazy.  i kept this secret until now.   i followed the object in the night sky until it disappeard into the horizon.
content.summary: A star among stars but moving in straight line suddenly turned towards  another  location.
